controller

Class GeneticEvolutionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GeneticEvolutionController

  • public class GeneticEvolutionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that execute a generic evolutionary computation algorithm.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni

      • doCompuation

        public IPopulationMember doCompuation(int numberOfIterations,
                             int generationSize,
                             java.io.File log)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Main execution method used to start the evolutionary computation that tries to find the best solution for the given problem. The best solution it's the one with the highest fitness.
        Parameters:
        numberOfIterations - number of evolutionary computation before giving the solution.
        generationSize - number of individuals in each iteration
        log - file to write reports of each iteration
        Returns:
        the fittest individual found after the setted iteration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - unable to open the log file or to write in it
